titles: Of justification four disputations clearing and amicably defending the truth against the unnecessary oppositions of divers learned and reverend brethren / by Richard Baxter ...
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
publisher: Printed by R.W. for Nevil Simmons ... and are to be sold by him ... and by Nathaniel Elkins ...,
notes: The four disputations have special title pages.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
